title: Splunk的安装和基本使用
title_translated: Installation and basic use of Splunk
summary: The Splunk data platform provides powerful insights and analytics capabilities, but does not contain a unique and identifiable CVE.

title: 新型信息窃取木马SHUYAL攻击19款主流浏览器窃取登录凭证
title_translated: A new type of information theft horse SHUYAL attacked 19 mainstream browsers and stole login documents.
summary: SHUYAL malware steals documents, captures system intercepts, clipboard contents and conducts systematic reconnaissance. It uses multistage attack vectors, automatic prohibition of Windows task manager, and complex counter-detection mechanisms to evade detection.

title: 人工智能可能修复帮助传播了 15 年的漏洞
title_translated: The repair of artificial intelligence may have helped spread a 15-year gap.
summary: An artificial intelligence tool can help eliminate a 10-year-old vulnerability that allows an attacker to navigate outside the specified directory.

title: В России может появиться новая статья УК для киберпреступников
title_translated: In Russia may appear a new article of the criminal code for cybercriminals
summary: Russian government proposes new measures to combat remote fraud, including tougher penalties for extortion using digital technologies. The proposal aims to add a new part to Article 163 of the Criminal Code providing for separate liability for extortion using digital technologies.

title: Московские школы начали требовать от учеников и родителей установки MAX
title_translated: Moscow schools began to require students and parents to install MAX
summary: In Moscow, some schools are requiring students and parents to install the MAX messenger, replacing the Sferum platform. Parents are expressing discontent with this requirement, and there is uncertainty about whether these regulations have legal force.

title: Аэрофлот сообщил о сбое в работе информационных систем
title_translated: Aeroflot reported a failure in the work of information systems
summary: Aeroflot Airlines reported a failure in their information systems, leading to disruptions in digital services and potential flight delays/cancellations.

title: ИИ-инструменты могут получить статус соавтора в разработке ядра Linux
title_translated: AI tools can get co-author status in Linux kernel development
summary: Nvidia developer Sasha Levin proposes patch series to integrate AI assistants into Linux kernel development process with rules and guidelines.

title: Endgame Gear распространяла вредонос в конфигураторе мыши OP1w 4k v2
title_translated: Endgame Gear Distributed Malware in OP1w 4k v2 Mouse Configurator
summary: Endgame Gear's official website was compromised, allowing malware to spread through a wireless mouse configurator. Users who downloaded the OP1w 4k v2 setup tool between June 26 and July 9 should check their systems for potential infection.

title: Обновление Windows 11 снова доступно для игроков с Easy Anti-Cheat
title_translated: Windows 11 Update Now Available for Players with Easy Anti-Cheat
summary: Microsoft resolves issue with Easy Anti-Cheat causing blue screens during Windows 11 updates. The restriction on updating Windows has been lifted, allowing users to safely update without issues.

title: Microsoft: Мы не можем защитить данные пользователей от запросов США
title_translated: Microsoft: We cannot protect user data from U.S. requests.
summary: Microsoft, AWS, and Google may be forced to transfer user data from the EU to the US due to the CLOUD Act. This raises concerns about digital sovereignty and the potential for US authorities to access EU user data.

title: Разработчик фишинг-наборов получил 7 лет за ущерб в $134 млн
title_translated: Phishing kit developer gets 7 years for $134 million damage
summary: A British student, Ollie Holman, was sentenced to 7 years in prison for creating and distributing phishing tools that caused over $134 million in damages. The kits mimicked government services, financial organizations, and charities, allowing attackers to access personal data and payment details.

title: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
title_translated: PaperCut NG/MF Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) Vulnerability
summary: PaperCut NG/MF contains a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, which, under specific conditions, could potentially enable an attacker to alter security settings or execute arbitrary code.

title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Cisco Identity Services Engine Injection Vulnerability
summary: Cisco Identity Services Engine contains an injection vulnerability allowing remote code execution and obtaining root privileges on affected devices. Successful exploitation can occur by submitting a crafted API request.

title: Malicious Windows Script Host VBScript (.vbs) File
title_translated: Malicious Windows Script Host VBScript (.vbs) File
summary: This module creates a Windows Script Host (WSH) VBScript (.vbs) file.

title: Malicious Windows Script Host JScript (.js) File
title_translated: Malicious Windows Script Host JScript (.js) File

title: FreeBSD: VID-0F5BCBA2-67FB-11F0-9EE5-B42E991FC52E (CVE-2025-6965): sqlite -- Integer Truncation on SQLite
title_translated: FreeBSD: VID-0F5BCBA2-67FB-11F0-9EE5-B42E991FC52E (CVE-2025-6965): sqlite -- Integer Truncation on SQLite
summary: A vulnerability exists in SQLite versions before 3.50.2 where excessive aggregate terms can lead to memory corruption. Upgrade to version 3.50.2 or above.
